website_summaries.verdict: The Shark line of floor cleaning products have always been competitive with higher end products, and this carpet sweeper is no exception. We believe users with light to medium carpet sweeping needs will be very satisfied.
pros: Surprisingly powerful for a rechargeable cordless model
Handle folds and collapses to sweep hard-to-reach places
Relatively quiet operation and very lightweight
cons: Some user concerns about pet hair removal and side "squeegee" design

customer_reviews.title: The Shark is now a Turd.
customer_reviews.text: I had one of these a few years ago. I used it strictly in my carpeted workshop where I used drills, welders, saws, routers, etc. The Shark kept the floor free of metal and wood shavings, chips, filings, etc. This new one will never match up. Not even close. Don’t waste your money. seriously
customer_reviews.author: Phil

customer_reviews.title: I love it. We have it in our camper
customer_reviews.text: I love it. We have it in our camper. Works great. We ordered one for our granddaughter in law for her birthday. May order one for the house. Cleans carpet and rugs well.
customer_reviews.author: Kuntry Nana

customer_reviews.title: love it.
customer_reviews.text: light weight no assemblying just stick/handle goes with ease.. emptying dirt container very simple.. although snug at first.. love it..
customer_reviews.author: divinemissmoe

customer_reviews.title: Cordless sweeper
customer_reviews.text: Love this sweeper I use it all the time. Battery seems to last a long time when you use on hard floors. It is perfect for our Camper, and home spot cleaning.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t last long
customer_reviews.text: Only used it a few times and it worked great but now won’t take a charge
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Smaller than expected...
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed in the size....thought it would be a little bigger. The pickup is good on it, but the handle sometimes comes off and have to readjust it again. It's good for a small area rug. I've had a couple Shark Cordless Sweepers, but they were more powerful than this one, and larger. I like them, though, and will buy again next time, but a larger model. Bonnie B.
customer_reviews.author: Bonnie B.

customer_reviews.title: Love this unit
customer_reviews.text: Love this unit!!! It is light weight and very easy to use. Gets up lots of dirt and because it is so easy, I use it all the time.
customer_reviews.author: leslie waldrup

customer_reviews.title: It is cordless
customer_reviews.text: There is nothing I dislike about the Shark. I have had several and they all have been wonderful. They work very good on carpet as well as hardwood floors. I have had several of these Sharks and loved all of them.. Can't do without it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not as well made as the older ones and not as powerful but still works.
customer_reviews.author: Jan Smith

customer_reviews.title: Bad product and poor rude customer service.
customer_reviews.text: VERY disappointed. After only 2 months the motor was seizing up. I paid over $50 for it. Shark said it was covered under warranty but wanted to charge an additional $20 to have another delivered. I don’t want to be out MORE on this unit when its durability is so awful. Customer service woman hung up on me as well. BAD product and BAD customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Worked great, best thing I'd ever had for kitty litter ...
customer_reviews.text: Worked great, best thing I'd ever had for kitty litter on floor, but 3 months into having it, it no longer turns on.
customer_reviews.author: Julie S
